item.title: Roblox: Steal Cappuccina From TungTung Codes (July 2025)
item.description:
Steal Cappuccina From TungTung is a survival game in Roblox based on brainrot content, where your main task is to steal Ballerina Capucina from TungTung Sahur. It sounds strange, but if you succeed, you get Points, Gems, and other useful resources that will help you in your next missions.

Redeeming Steal Cappuccina From TungTung codes is an equally useful trick that you can use to get both Gems and Points. Hurry up, because the codes are limited in time, so if you don't redeem them, you simply won't get rewards.

All Steal Cappuccina From TungTung Codes

Working Steal Cappuccina From TungTung Codes

  • firstcode - Redeem this code to get 300 Points and ten Gems.
  • tungtungtung - Redeem this code to get 1,000 Points and 100 Gems.

Expired Steal Cappuccina From TungTung Codes

There are currently no expired Steal Cappuccina From TungTung codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Whether you're new to this Roblox game or already farming high scores, using codes in Steal Cappuccina From TungTung is always a good idea. Each one can reward you with Gems, Points, or other helpful items for faster progression.

How to Redeem Codes for Steal Cappuccina From TungTung

If you don't know where to enter the codes in Steal Cappuccina From TungTung , don't worry, the process is quick and easy for beginners. To get your rewards, just follow the instructions below. We've described each step in detail:

  • Launch Steal Cappuccina From TungTung .
  • Pay attention to the upper left corner of the screen. There will be a button with a gift icon. Click on it.
  • This will open a drop-down menu with several options. Among them, find and interact with the one that says Code.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a blue Redeem button below it. Now, copy and paste one of the active codes from the list above into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the blue Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Steal Cappuccina From TungTung Codes

To find more Steal Cappuccina From TungTung codes, be sure to follow the game's official social media pages. Developers often share new Roblox codes during updates or events, so checking these platforms regularly can help you catch them early:

  • Official Steal Cappuccina From TungTung Roblox group.
  • Official Steal Cappuccina From TungTung game page.
  • Official Steal Cappuccina From TungTung X account.

item.title: 99 Nights in The Forest: All Craftable Items & What They Do
item.description:
Surviving in 99 Nights in The Forest is a difficult task, especially if you want to reach day 300 for one of the Badges. Players will have to explore various corners in search of missing children, as well as resources that can be used for crafting.

Crafting is an integral part of survival in the dangerous forest of 99 Nights in The Forest , but it is worth noting that not all items have practical significance, so you do not have to craft all the recipes. For those wondering where to start, here's a detailed look at all the Craftable items in 99 Nights in The Forest and what they do .

How to Craft in 99 Nights in The Forest

When you start a run of 99 Nights in The Forest , your base will be quite small. Luckily, you will have a small campfire and a level-one Crafting Bench. With the latter, players can craft various items, including vital ones like a map.

But before you can start crafting anything in this Roblox game, you will need to find resources. Most of them can be found nearby in the forest. It is important to note that placing resources near the Crafting Bench or holding them in your hands is useless. Instead, players must throw resources into the Crafting Bench grinder. Then, they can interact with it and select one of the available crafting recipes to create the desired item.

For more advanced items, you will need a higher-level Crafting Bench. Luckily, crafting it is as easy as other items if you find enough resources.

All 99 Nights in The Forest Craftable Items

Players can craft quite a few different items in 99 Nights in The Forest , but not all of them are equally useful. As such, we have compiled a list of all craftable items that can be found in 99 Nights in The Forest and provided descriptions of what they can be used for.

Item

Materials

Crafting Bench Level

Description

Map

3 Wood Logs

Level 1

Unlocks a map feature, so it's definitely worth crafting.

Farm Plot

10 Wood Logs

Level 1

Allows you to grow Carrots directly on the base.

Crafting Bench 2 Upgrade

5 Wood Logs, 1 Scrap

Level 1

Unlocks Crafting Bench 2 Level 2.

Compass

3 Scraps

Level 2

It provides directions to help you navigate locations, but it is useless if you have a map.

Sundial

5 Scraps

Level 2

Shows you how much time is left until nightfall and dawn.

Bear Trap

3 Scraps

Level 2

Not a bad trap, although it does little damage.

Old Bed

5 Scraps

Level 2

Increases your day counter by +1.

Shelf

2 Scraps

Level 2

It is convenient for storing things without throwing them all over the base.

Wood Rain Storage

5 Scraps

Level 2

Allows players to keep logs dry even in the rain.

Crafting Bench 3 Upgrade

15 Wood Logs, 10 Scraps

Level 3

Unlocks Crafting Bench 2 Level 3.

Lightning Rod

8 Scraps

Level 3

Attracts lightning during a thunderstorm, saving you from damage.

Torch

6 Wood Logs, 6 Scraps

Level 3

Illuminates more area.

Good Bed

10 Wood Logs, 10 Scraps

Level 3

Increases your day counter by +1.

Biofuel Processor

12 Wood Logs, 10 Scraps

Level 3

Allows you to process Scraps, Pelts, Meat, and food into fuel for a fire.

Boost Pad

15 Wood Logs, 10 Scraps

Level 3

Gives you a speed boost to explore the forest, but due to the recharge it requires, it's not really worth the resources.

Crack Pot

15 Wood Logs, 10 Scraps

Level 3

You can prepare different dishes from several ingredients to satisfy more hunger.

Crafting Bench 4 Upgrade

2 Cultist Medallions, 30 Wood Logs, and 20 Scraps

Level 3

Unlocks Crafting Bench 2 Level 4.

Teleporter

1 Cultist Medallion, 15 Wood Logs, and 25 Scraps

Level 4

Allows you to instantly teleport between two points, so you will have to craft two of these devices.

Ammo Crate

2 Cultist Medallions, 30 Wood Logs, and 20 Scraps

Level 4

Allows you to replenish your ammo supply right at your base.

Giant Bed

1 Cultist Medallion, 20 Wood Logs, and 30 Scraps

Level 4

Increases your day counter by +1.

Oil Drill

1 Cultist Medallion, 25 Wood Logs, and 35 Scraps

Level 4

Gives players an Oil Barrel every day.

item.title: PS Plus Extra and Premium Games for July 2025 Revealed
item.description:
PlayStation Plus Extra and Premium members can look forward to 10 new games joining the service in July 2025. This month's PS Plus Extra and Premium lineup is rather strong, as it includes not only a day one release, but also one of the most critically-acclaimed games of the decade so far.

Sony's PS Plus subscription service is split across three tiers: Essential, Extra, and Premium. While PS Plus Essential members receive a rotating lineup of monthly games to claim and keep with an active subscription, the Extra and Premium tiers offer access to an expansive library of downloadable titles, cycled in and out every month. PS Plus Premium users get the added bonus of classic PlayStation games and select game trials.

For the PS Plus 15th anniversary celebration - running from July 1 to August 4 - the service's Extra and Premium tiers have been bolstered with none other than Cyberpunk 2077 . CD Projekt Red's beloved sci-fi RPG is now available for PS Plus Extra and Premium members to dive in, and Cyberpunk 2077 's Phantom Liberty DLC is also available with an exclusive 30 percent discount for subscribers through July 23. Additionally, co-op survival crafting game Abiotic Factor 's PS5 version will be available on PS Plus Extra and Premium straight away once it launches on July 22.

PS Plus Extra and Premium Games for July 2025

Game Catalog (PS Plus Extra and Premium)

  • Cyberpunk 2077 (PS5, PS4)
  • Abiotic Factor (PS5)
  • Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden (PS5)
  • Bluey: The Videogame (PS5, PS4)
  • New World: Aeternum (PS5)
  • Planet Zoo (PS5)
  • Risk of Rain 2 (PS5, PS4)
  • Tropico 6 – Next Gen Edition (PS5, PS4)

Classics Catalog (PS Plus Premium only)

  • Twisted Metal 3 (PS5, PS4)
  • Twisted Metal 4 (PS5, PS4)

The rest of the PS Plus Extra July 2025 lineup, namely Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden , Planet Zoo: Console Edition , Bluey: The Videogame , Risk of Rain 2 , Tropico 6 , and New World: Aeternum , will go live on Tuesday, July 15 . Those interested in the PS Plus Premium classics catalog, meanwhile, will be able to play Twisted Metal 3 and Twisted Metal 4 on the same day, which seems to be timed favorably considering the Twisted Metal show's Season 2 is set to drop on July 31.

July looks to be one of the best months for PS Plus in 2025 so far, with even the Essential tier adding Diablo 4 this month. It should be interesting how these additions affect sentiments surrounding the subscription service, given the recent PS Plus cancelation fiasco where some subscribers took issue with the service's "Cancel Auto Renewal" prompt being changed to "Cancel Subscription," thereby making the process seem more confusing than it actually is.

item.title: Borderlands 4's Timekeeper is Facing an Uphill Battle, and Not For the Reason You Think
item.description:
At this point in the franchise, it’s no secret that Handsome Jack is widely considered to be the fan-favorite antagonist over any other big bad from the Borderlands games so far. Naturally, with the release date for Borderlands 4 only a couple of months away, now arriving on September 12, it remains to be seen how the upcoming Timekeeper villain will compare to the likes of Handsome Jack, as well as any of the other, less popular villains from the Borderlands franchise.

However, another upcoming antagonist in Borderlands 4 is already poised to steal the Timekeeper’s thunder in his own game, so the Timekeeper’s biggest competition could be a lot closer to home than Handsome Jack could ever be. Based on fans’ reactions to the latest behind-the-scenes trailer for Borderlands 4 , the Ripper Queen already seems to be a fan favorite, more so than the Timekeeper.

Handsome Jack May Not Be Borderlands 4’s Timekeeper’s Biggest Competition

After the first teaser gave a deeper dive into some of the new playable Vault Hunters, Borderlands 4 ’s latest behind-the-scenes teaser trailer has officially revealed the concept art and origin stories for some of the upcoming characters, including the main antagonists and potential allies. Among the many main characters that players can encounter on the planet Kairos in Borderlands 4 , one of the new villains arguably seems like they could dethrone Handsome Jack as the new fan-favorite of the franchise, or if not, still be the star of the show in Borderlands 4 ’s main story. And surprisingly, it’s not Borderlands 4 ’s main villain, the Timekeeper.

Borderlands 4’s New ‘Welcome to Kairos’ BTS Trailer Puts the Spotlight on Kairos’ New Villains and Character Factions

As the Timekeeper’s underlings, characters like Idolator Sol and Levain could end up being memorable boss fights in Borderlands 4 , but their impression on the franchise’s community might ultimately fade before it ever takes off the way Handsome Jack did over the course of Borderlands 2 and Borderlands The Pre-Sequel . Even if they do survive the events of Borderlands 4 , these villains would likely be doomed to be overshadowed by the game's main villain. So, if any villains in Borderlands 4 stand a chance at dethroning Handsome Jack as the new fan-favorite of the franchise, it’s arguably between the Timekeeper and the Ripper Queen.

Borderlands 4’s Ripper Queen’s Moral Complexity Could Be Her Key to Walking in Handsome Jack’s Shoes

With the Timekeeper, this character is said to be a dreadful, overarching villain for this new chapter in the Borderlands franchise’s ongoing story, presumably portrayed as a pure antagonist. Whereas, with the Ripper Queen, there’s already plenty of speculation among fans that this antagonist may not be as one-sided as the Timekeeper, with some theories predicting that the Ripper Queen may turn out to be an unexpected ally at some point in Borderlands 4 . After Handsome Jack walked a similar path as a complex character, ranging from a sympathetic ally to a vengeance-driven villain, it already seems like Borderlands 4 ’s Ripper Queen could follow in Handsome Jack’s footsteps to become the new fan-favorite of the franchise, ultimately overshadowing the Timekeeper in his own game.

These overall strong positive reactions and creative fan theories regarding the Ripper Queen so far are quite notable, especially considering that fans weren’t shy about expressing their lack of enthusiasm regarding the next generations of playable Vault Hunters in Borderlands 4 when these characters were first revealed. So, while the Timekeeper was inevitably going to have some tough competition to live up to after Handsome Jack’s beloved legacy, the Ripper Queen might prove to be an even tougher opponent to compete with.

item.title: Roblox: Are You Smart? Codes (July 2025)
item.description:
Are You Smart? is one of the representatives of the education genre, where players can compete against one another. In the tests, you will answer various questions on history, mathematics, geography, and Roblox . In addition, players can play mini-games and earn Bucks. With this guide, players will learn about Are You Smart? codes, which will help them earn extra money.

Players can claim various rewards with these codes, including Bucks. However, after some time has passed since the release, each code expires, so you should hurry to redeem them to avoid missing out on free goodies.

All Are You Smart? Codes

Working Are You Smart? Codes

  • RELEASE - Redeem this code to get 100 Bucks

Expired Are You Smart? Codes

  • THANKYOU

The gameplay of Are You Smart? may seem quite simple, as players only need to answer questions correctly to earn points and Bucks. But in reality, everything is a little more complicated, as the questions can range from topic to topic. Since these questions are randomly generated, you may come across extremely difficult tests. Also, in between lessons, players can play various mini-games to earn extra money. Most of them require skill, so be prepared to spend time before you start winning. But if you want to earn money from the first minutes of the game, then Are You Smart? codes are what you need.

Most of these Roblox codes contain Bucks. Therefore, even a few of them will be enough to buy new accessories for your character. However, players can easily miss out on rewards due to the short validity period of the codes.

How to Redeem Are You Smart? Codes

Using codes in Are You Smart? is no different from most other Roblox games. All you need to do is press a few keys. And for your convenience, you can follow these simple steps.

  • First, launch the Are You Smart? experience.
  • Then, open the shop by clicking on the basket icon on the left side of the screen.
  • Next, click on the ticket icon to go to the Codes section.
  • After that, enter the code and click the Redeem button to claim the reward.

How to Get More Are You Smart? Codes

To get fresh Are You Smart? codes first-hand, you should visit the official developer pages. There, they post all the news about the game, including upcoming updates and giveaways:

  • Cupiful X (Twitter) page
  • Cupiful Roblox group
  • Cupiful Discord server
